borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied or used at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 89 & 91 Lindsey Road, RM8 2RD and as shown on the plans hereby approved.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>Y1957/2024-A00 - Proposed Roof Extensions - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A20 (Rev 02) - Proposed Floor Plans - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A21&nbsp;(Rev 02)&nbsp;- Proposed Attic Level and Roof Plans - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A22&nbsp;(Rev 02)&nbsp;- Proposed Sections - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A23&nbsp;(Rev 02)&nbsp;- Proposed Front and Left Side Elevations - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A24&nbsp;(Rev 02)&nbsp;- Proposed Rear and Right Side Elevations - 17/06/2024</li><li>Y1957/2024-A30 - Location &amp; Block Plans - 17/06/2024</li><li>Planning Statement - 07/2024</li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of part two storey part single storey side and rear extensions, hip- to- gable roof extensions to accommodate rear dormer extensions including two windows to the sides and alterations to existing roof lights at both 89 and 91 Lindsey Road, partial demolition of the existing garage at 89 Lindsey Road and construction of a single storey rear outbuilding at 91 Lindsey Road
